title: Sample, ca. 1946
medium:
Medium: synthetic
Technique: plain weave with combined warps and combined wefts; bands caused by changing the "a" and "b" plain weave shed sequence
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 18.5 x 20 cm (7 5/16 x 7 7/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Plain weave with combined warps and combined wefts. Warp has a group of two brown boucle and two-ply brown yarns that alternates with two-ply brown yarn. Weft has flat gold metallic paired with wrapped gold metallic yarns that alternate with a combination of smooth gray yarn, green plied yarn and purple boucle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, ca. 1946.
ca. 1946. Medium: synthetic
